string.text: Stop stalker. You can't go any further!
Why?

Because that's our territory - Duty territory; and we're very picky about who we let through into our base. If you don't have anything important to discuss with our leaders you ain't getting past here.
I see.
Those are the rules.
I need to go there, I have some business with the barman.
Even so, passage costs money. We'll let you through for half a thousand or you can do us a favour - up to you.
I prefer to pay. Here.
Sweet! Go on through but you better have some real important business with the barman, you hear? Be careful - there are lots of anomalies ahead.
What's the favour?
Nothing much. There is a herd of boars wandering nearby that needs to be killed. Take 'em out and consider your passage paid for.
Deal.
Good luck, stalker.
I don't have money.
Well, then you have a chance to save some, eh?
I don't have money.
Well, you can't go through to the bar then.
So, you killed those nasty boars yet?
Not yet.
When you're cutting them up for chops bring me one, would you?
Yeah, I killed them all.
OK, go on and say "hi" to the barman from me.
Say "hi" to the barman from me when you see him. Oh, and don't forget - there are lots of anomalies on the way so be careful.
Thanks mate - you really helped me out. I won't forget it.
What's going on here?
OK.

We're trying to clear the Dump of bandits. My friends are waiting for a bandit raid nearby. We're trying to stop them because if they take control of the Dump nobody will be able to go deep into the Zone. Talk to our commander, he's not far from here at the vehicle graveyard with his boys. I'm going there myself - we could go together if you want.
Let's go.
Can you tell me anything about the Dump?

There ain't much to tell, mate. The Dump is...a dump. Duty fighters guard the northern road to the Bar. You might want to avoid them - Duty is full of some real nasty types. To the right are the paths into the Dark Valley but the radiation is very powerful there. A little closer is the Grimpen Mire - marshes full of anomalies. Rumour has it that you are very likely to find some decent artifacts there but even more likely to find a lot of trouble. Oh well, at least there ain't no Hounds of the Baskervilles in the Mire!
Go on.

To the right, by the marshes, there's a secret hiding place. You'll see a metallic construction overhanging a puddle. My stash is right below it…I put it there a while ago but you saved my life and you probably need it more anyway. So feel free to use it
Thanks mate, that's useful info.
Useful info, thanks.

Hey stalker, you're just in time! We really need your help. Those bandit bastards are trying to take control of the Dump. We had a shootout here half an hour ago and managed to take down three of the dogs. The others retreated but they're blatantly gonna come back with reinforcements any minute now. There aren't many of us and another man wouldn't hurt.
Go on.
We've set up an ambush for them here. They'll be coming from the west, from Agroprom R&D Institute. If you help us destroy their reinforcements you won't regret it, believe you me!
OK, I'll help.
Great.
It's none of my business and I don't want to get involved.
As you wish. You'll be cursing your stupidity every time you pay those boneheads for passage into the Zone.
I've shot them all.
You're the man! But I'll play it safe just in case.
We have nothing to talk about.
Thanks mate, you really helped us out there. Will you accept some cash as our gratitude?
Sure.
Here, it should pay for some medical treatment to recover your health.
Thank you.
Tell me about yourself.

Around here they called me Demon. I came to these parts three years ago. Like many of the guys in the Zone I'm a fugitive, wanted for two murders and GBH. A few years ago a mate of mine was battered pretty badly in another area - they had to literally put him back together at the hospital. I paid the bastards who did it a little "visit". When the coppers showed up I had to shoot one of them and jump out of a second-floor window - I've been here since. I've done well in this place but the list of my crimes has got a little longer too. I try to fight lawlessness just as I did on the outside, I train up rookies and teach them to survive in the Zone.
So why don't you join Duty if you feel that way?
Duty fights against the Zone, I fight for the people. Besides, they're too closely linked with the government and the army. I don't want to wake up in detention one day.
Good luck to you.
What's the place?

The Dump. We'll be right at home here. You see those heaps of crap? You don't want to go there as they're so full of radioactive waste that a Geiger counter goes off the scale. The only decent way into the Zone is here and bandits have been increasingly active here lately. They're shit scared of going deeper into the Zone like experienced stalkers - that's \nDuty territory; but those hyenas love robbing the rookies here. So, if nobody else cares, we have to stand our ground and fight.
Go on.
That's my outlook on life. Everywhere, and especially here, you gotta act like a man, not some animal that is driven only by greed.
Are there any large buildings in the Dump?

There's a big abandoned hangar in the centre which is pretty quiet - you can even stay the night there if you really have to. If you go west, towards the Institute, you'll find the bandit's camp. That's where the bastards we killed earlier came from and I doubt that's the end of that.
Thank you.
Thanks, I don't need anything from you.
I know quite a lot, I could share some info with you.
The job ain't done. Let's finish it and talk later.
Hey, Marked One.
Goddamit it man, this ain't no time for talking! In a few seconds, they only things talking will be weapons. Help me fight them off and we can talk after.
Thanks for the help, things got pretty hairy. What are you doing here anyway?
I am looking for information about Sharpshooter. Fox told me about you so I came to talk.

OK, you helped me out for free so I'll tell you. One of the guys, a former "digger" called Mole is waiting for me. He dug up Sharpshooter's stash but I don't know if he found anything there. Here are the co-ordinates of our meeting place; tell him I sent you. They'll be looking for me now so I am going to disappear deep underground.
Thanks for the information.
I am looking for information about Sharpshooter, maybe you know something?

OK, you helped me out for free so I'll tell you. One of the guys, a former "digger" called Mole is waiting for me. He dug up Sharpshooter's stash and found some documents that explain a few things. He had some bandits on his tail so he didn't take the documents but he remembered the place where they were. They'll be looking for me now so I am gonna disappear deep underground. Here are the co-ordinates of the meeting place with Mole; tell him I sent you. I'll upload some info to your PDA.
Thanks for the information.
Hey mate, things got pretty hairy here a minute ago, I had some fun. What are you doing here anyway?
A straight road to you, stalker, a straight road past the anomalies straight to the artifacts.
What can you find at the Dump?

You can find a lot of trouble real quick, that's for sure. But if you're such an explorer I'll tell you what I know. To the east is a little forest. There's nothing interesting there but it's full of dogs. Be careful. If you follow this railway track it will lead you to the tunnel. There are lots of anomalies there; maybe something else too but I don't know - never really looked very hard. You probably know about the Duty checkpoint in the north. That's basically all I know about this place.
Thanks for the information.
Listen man, what can I find at this Dump?

You can find a lot of trouble real quick, that's for sure. But if you're such an explorer I'll tell you what I know. To the east is a little forest. There's nothing interesting there but it's full of dogs. Be careful. If you follow this railway track it will lead you to the tunnel. There are lots of anomalies there; maybe something else too but I don't know - never really looked very hard. You probably know about the Duty checkpoint in the north. That's basically all I know about this place.
Thanks for the info. I'll keep it in mind.
Can you tell me anything about this place?

Well, at the moment we're standing in a big stinking dump. After the accident in 1986 they brought radioactive waste, cranes and destroyed vehicles here. Basically, it's full of useless crap and a few anomalies here and there. You can even find artifacts here but they're not good ones so that's why you'll mostly find rookies in this place. Lots of rookies means lots of bandits so it's best not to hang around. Further to the east there are loads of radiation pockets; you can't go there without protection. As you move to the south you'll reach the Zone's border. Go north and you'll eventually reach Rostok factory where you'll have no trouble finding the stalker bar. To the east is the Dark Valley, a gloomy place permanently saturated with mist. To the west is the Agroprom R&D Institute. I'll mark safe pathways on your map.
